archimate:BusinessRole.name: Staff Elastic Search user
archimate:BusinessRole.documentation: As of April 2021, all scimma staff is federated through "scimma_user" elastic search role. Others are not. Users can see all options, but are restricted from accessing admin functionality. an indiividual user authenticated byh comanage to use ELK, accessing the ELK using fderated Identihy.
